para.emphasis: New action for checking the text of tooltips

listitem.para: You can now check the text of tooltips using the unbound module ub_ttc_checkTooltipText.
DatePickers in the JavaFX toolkit can now be addressed as components with text input. You can also execute tests which address graphics components (ub_grc) on DatePickers.

para.emphasis: Take screenshot on error now supported in the Java API

listitem.para: Take screenshot on error is now supported when using the Java API.

para.emphasis: Reporting to ALM is now performed by having n transactions for n test results / field updates.
